channel.title: docker on MBlog
channel.description: Recent content in docker on MBlog

item.title: Difference Between RUN and CMD in Dockerfile
item.description: RUN - command triggers while we build the docker image. CMD - command triggers while we launch the created docker image.

item.title: Copying Files From Docker Container to Host
item.description: Option 1 In order to copy a file from a container to the host, you can use the command 1docker cp <containerId>:/path/within/container /host/path/target
